sentences.en: Conclusion Ureter orthopedics and reduction are ideal for the treatment retrocaval ureter.
sentences.cn: 结论下腔静脉后输尿管复位矫形手术可获较好疗效.

sentences.en: Conclusion. Medication errors in ordering are common in orthopedics.
sentences.cn: 结论: 矫形外科的医嘱开错现象是常见的.

sentences.en: Did you always know you wanted to specialize in orthopedics?
sentences.cn: 你一直都知道你要做个矫形外科医生 吗 ?

sentences.en: If this description matches your behavior, you're probably a weekend warrior, said Jeffrey Spang, MD, an assistant professor of orthopedics at the University of North Carolina School of Medicine.
sentences.cn: 如果这个描述正好刻画了你的行为，那你很可能就是一个周末斗士了，北卡罗莱纳大学医学院整形外科助教杰弗里·斯潘医学博士如是说。

sentences.en: It combines mechatronics technology with orthopedics technology in Chinese medicine.
sentences.cn: 是现代机电技术和中医矫形技术有机结合的产品.

sentences.en: Method: 106 cases were studied about their orthopedics and general surgery.
sentences.cn: 方法: 抽取2003年10月份出院的骨外及普外科手术病历各53份,统计分析围手术期抗菌药应用情况.

sentences.en: Objective : To provide anatomic data for clinical orthopedics, aesthetics, cosmetology and plastic surgery on the nose.
sentences.cn: 目的: 为临床整形外科学 、 美学 、 美容学做鼻整形术提供解剖学数据.

sentences.en: Objective Discussing the origin orthopedics patient's pressure ulcers and nursing strategy, enhances work quality of nurse.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨骨科患者压疮成因和护理对策, 提高护理质量.

sentences.en: Objective To probe the feasibility and efficacy of damage control orthopedics ( DCO ) in treating multiple injuries.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨严重多发伤时损伤控制骨科 ( DCO ) 应用的可行性和疗效.

sentences.en: Objective: To analyze the perioperative use of antimicrobials in 106 cases of orthopedics and general surgery.
sentences.cn: 目的: 了解我院骨外及普外科围手术期抗菌药应用情况并作出客观评价.

sentences.en: Orthopedics ( or orthopedic surgery ): Medical specialty concerned with the skeleton and its associated structures.
sentences.cn: 骨外科学: 有关骨骼系统及其相关构造功能的维持与恢复之医学专科.

sentences.en: PrefaceThe developmental dislocation of the hip ( DDH ) is the common disorder in pediatric orthopedics.
sentences.cn: 发育性髋脱位 ( DevelopmentalDislocation oftheHip, DDH ) 是小儿骨科的一种常见病,髋臼病变相对较重.

sentences.en: SETTING: Department of Orthopedics, Duisburg - Essen University.
sentences.cn: 单位: 德国 Duisburg -Essen大学医院骨科.

sentences.en: This article describes a surgical planning system for pediatric hip orthopedics surgery.
sentences.cn: 文章介绍了针对小儿先天性髋脱位整形手术的术前规划系统.

sentences.en: Towards the Reduction of Medication Errors in Orthopedics and Spinal Surgery: Outcomes Using a Pharmacist - Led Approach.
sentences.cn: 减少矫形外科和脊柱外科的错用药物的现象的研究: 来自药剂师主持的实验的结果.

sentences.en: We have prosthetics components, universal orthopedics products , wheelchairs, mobility aids and other rehab and home products.
sentences.cn: 公司产品有假肢零部件 、 通用矫形器 、 轮椅车、电动轮椅, 以及其他各种康健用品用具.

trans.tran_cn: 整形手术，矫形术，整形外科，矫形学
trans.tran_en: the part of medicine that treats illnesses or injuries that affect people’s bones or muscles
